rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0001
rows.name:
A bunch of Drivers got arrested by an
Superbian squad at Twin Trunks Hill
recently.

rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Why would someone who got the
chance to become a Driver go and
ruin it all by doing bad things...?

rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0003
rows.name:
There are people who'd do anything
to be a Driver! How dare they exploit
their Blades like that!
